p: Anthralin and 5,6-dichlorobenzimidazole (DRB) were purchased from Aladdin (Aladdin Industrial Corporation, Shanghai, China) and the 50 mM drug stock solution was formulated with the dimethyl sulfoxide. Ribavirin was purchased from Sigma Chemical Company (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, United States) and a 100 mM stock solution was made for use. ApG was purchased from Jena Bioscience.
